tafsirQuiz.question: According to the tafsir, what should we understand from this verse?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Due to some domestic problems created by his wives, the Prophet vowed that he would not take honey. But, a prophet’s actions become examples for his followers
distractors: This verse focuses on scientific facts
This verse only discusses worldly matters
This verse addresses only legal rulings

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah At-Tahrim, Ayah 3?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: In the above-mentioned affair, some wives of the Prophet Muhammad had created complications in his house. By way of warning, his consorts have been addressed here in the manner of an ultimatum
distractors: This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse describes the characteristics of believers

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: In the present world it often happens that a man knows that something is right, but excessive attachment to his wife and children compels him to shun the right path and do only that which his wife and children desire
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah At-Tahrim, Ayah 8?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: True tawbah is the light of the Hereafter and false tawbah is the darkness of the Hereafter. In the present world man has been kept in trial conditions and as such he is liable to commit errors
distractors: This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah At-Tahrim, Ayah 9?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Elders and other responsible people should keep a watchful eye on all members of society, and if any Muslim adopts a wrong path, all possible efforts should be made to prevent him from doing so
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The husband was sent to hell and the wife found her place in the gardens of paradise. So when she kept herself on the right path, her husband’s wrong behaviour did not harm her
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
